rules.active: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 5 metres away.

details.flavour: Go ahead, toss your hat in the ring.

rules.active: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 12 metres away.

details.flavour: If you're going to throw in the towel, at least do it properly.

rules.active: Throw an object as far as you want.

details.flavour: I want this thing gone, understand? I want to never see it again.

rules.active: Throw an object as far as you want. It cannot be stopped.

details.flavour: I guess in a way, we're all still chasing it.

rules.active: Deal 3 damage to a visible character with a painful bolt of electricity

details.flavour: A smile costs less than electricity, but gives much light

rules.active: Deal 4 damage and stun up to 2 visible characters.

details.flavour: "No." - Dr. Reed, in response to a question on whether or not a human should be able to shoot lightning out of their hands.

rules.active: Deal 6 damage and stun to up to 6 visible characters.

details.flavour: "Ouch" - Dr. Reed and his 5 assistants.

rules.active: Cause a complete blackout in a 100 kilometre radius. Draw 3 copies of Fork Lightning

details.flavour: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world.

rules.active: Ignite a small object within 3 metres.

details.flavour: Including but not limited to a friend's new article of clothing, letters from their loved ones, and paper money.

rules.active: Hurl a flaming ball of hot embers at a visible object.

details.flavour: Time for a game of hot potato!

rules.active: Deal 15 damage and set fire to all flammable objects within 6 metres.

details.flavour: The best part is that nice campfire smell.

rules.active: Summon a brick of material which burns violently forever when set on fire.

details.flavour: The fire in our hearts will never burn out
"Alright buddy, let's calm down ok?" - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father
"Good lord, look at him go.." - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

rules.active: Hover up to 2 metres off the ground until you lose concentration.

details.flavour: "I see. He is now a boy of the air, not of the ground." - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

details.rules: Jump as high as you want
details.flavour: "I miss him everyday" - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

details.rules: Target an object. It becomes moist, as if it had been sprayed with a fine mist
details.flavour: I think I'm going to need a change of clothes.

details.rules: Target a point. Everything within 2m of this point is now saturated with water.
details.flavour: My plan: complete. Their day: ruined.

details.rules: Summons 10000 gallons of water to a targeted point.
details.flavour: "Listen pal, I'm not afraid of getting a little wet. Go ahead and cast it" - Quomo the Quivering

details.rules: A Tsunami breaks over the play area from a cardinal direction of your choice.
details.flavour: Nature has a myriad of weapons to combat human arrogance.

details.rules: Change the value of thrown d20 or the next thrown d20 by 2
details.flavour: I can't see him, but I know he's there.

details.rules: You may force a thrown d20 or the next thrown d20 to be rerolled.
details.flavour: He will save us from our mortal errors.

details.rules: Instill a religious vision of your choosing into target character
details.flavour: He lives deep in the hearts of all men.

details.rules: All players will critically succeed on their next d20 roll this turn.
details.flavour: The light will shine bright upon the chosen.

details.rules: Cure the ailment of a visible character, or heal them 8.
details.flavour: Treats an upset stomach, a broken heart, or a pierced lung

rules.active: Heal 15 to a visible character. They can move twice as fast for the remainder of the session
rules.passive: Run twice as fast while carrying friendly characters

details.flavour: The best medicine is running far away from things which hurt you

details.rules: Restore a visible character to maximum health. Their maximum health permanently increases by 10 and they grow 3 feet taller.
details.flavour: "I hope you don't mind if I make some improvements while I'm in here" - Dr. Reichthardt, Orthopedic Surgeon

details.rules: Revive a dead character.
details.flavour: If man is to play god, he ought to be a kind one.

details.rules: Take no damage from the next attack targeting you.
details.flavour: I barely felt that! Who taught you how to punch?

rules.passive: Anything thrown on you is repelled with equal force
rules.active: Any damage dealt to you from the next attack targeting you is dealt both to you and your attacker
rules.flavour: Let's see how you like it!.

details.rules: Any damage dealt to you from the next attack targeting you is instead dealt to your attacker
details.flavour: I am rubber, and you are glue.

details.rules: Name a character. They can no longer deal damage to you.
details.flavour: "It's futile. I've already analyzed all of your moves." - 5 year old Jacob, karate yellow belt

details.rules: You can attack two additional times this turn
details.flavour: Before they even realized what happened, another punch sent them flying.

details.rules: You can attack four additional times this turn
details.flavour: Their defense won't last forever. Strike, and strike again.

details.rules: You can make twice times as many attacks as you otherwise would this turn.
details.flavour: Every fighter has gaps between attacks which can be exploited. Just make sure to take them after your opponent is dead.

details.rules: Take X damage. You can attack X times this turn
details.flavour: Punches, kicks, and jabs stretch out before me into endless infinity, a fractal of iron striking limbs.

details.rules: Throw target visible character up into the air
details.flavour: He should've worn a windbreaker.

rules.passive: Whenever you throw a character in the air, you can also throw them 8 squares in any direction
rules.active: Throw any number of characters in a 3 square radius into the air.

details.flavour: You look like a birthday candle.

details.rules: Throw any number of visible characters up into the air.
details.flavour: Rise, rise towards the heavens.

details.rules: A powerful hurricane is summoned over the play area which lasts as long as you want.
details.flavour: It is rare for an area to know such devestation.

details.rules: Summon an impassible wall of light on 1 square until end of turn.
details.flavour: "Quit the mime act and c'mon! We're getting out of here!" - Barry the Bandit

details.rules: Summon an immobile monk until end of turn who punches characters who come within range
details.flavour: His name is Po.

details.rules: Summon 3 immobile martial artists until end of turn who knock characters who come within range back 8 squares
details.flavour: Their names are Memboba, Imbosaa, and Steepedi.

details.rules: Summon a copy of any non-player character
details.flavour: "I hated the man so much I made a point of killing him twice" - R.J. Alabaster, Deranged Summoner
